content: Open Folders and open the folder you want to add the excel sheet toSelect the plus sign in the top right corner named Create/Upload Objects > Upload Document3. Find the Excel sheet and add it4. Create a new report with Excel as the data source5. Find the Excel file you want to use as the data source and press "Open"6. Choose what data from the Excel sheet you want to see, it can be defined by Range Definition or Range Name if not all the data is needed6. Assign labels to each column in the Excel sheet
title: Apricot Results: Building Reports with an Excel Document
